album.title: Now That's What I Call Music Vol. 83

wiki.summary: "Holiday" is a song released by British girl group Little Mix, on 24 July 2020 as the second single from their sixth studio album Confetti (2020). It was co-written by members Jade Thirlwall, Perrie Edwards, Leigh-Anne Pinnock, alongside Chris Loco, Camille Purcell and Goldfinger. Described as a pop song it was met with generally positive reviews from critics. The song peaked at number fifteen on the UK Singles Chart, and charted in additional ten other countries. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: "Holiday" is a song released by British girl group Little Mix, on 24 July 2020 as the second single from their sixth studio album Confetti (2020). It was co-written by members Jade Thirlwall, Perrie Edwards, Leigh-Anne Pinnock, alongside Chris Loco, Camille Purcell and Goldfinger. Described as a pop song it was met with generally positive reviews from critics. The song peaked at number fifteen on the UK Singles Chart, and charted in additional ten other countries. It has been certified gold both by the British Phonographic Industry (BPI) and Pro-Música Brasil (PMB). The song was said to include two choruses, one which is "fun and flirty" and the other being a "big singalong, let-your-hair-down moment". Read more on Last.fm.
